response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. I understand the importance of this opportunity and would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. Considering its high worth and your potential benefit, I propose to sell the product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive exceptional value while securing this remarkable asset at a favorable rate. Please let me know if you require any further information or wish to proceed with this unique opportunity.", "product_price": 950000}
